headline: Patient Monitoring Devices Research Report 2025: A Global $55+ Billion Market by 2030, Dominated by GE HealthCare, F. Hoffmann-La Roche, Koninklijke Philips, Medtronic, and Abbott
summary: Key opportunities in the global patient monitoring devices market include expanding use of miniaturized multi-sensing devices and adoption due to stringent regulations, enhanced self-management of chronic diseases, and growth potential in emerging regions. Sustainability and ESG practices also offer competitive advantages.
